navbar_logout_all_confirm: Are you sure you want to logout all accounts?
landing_hero_title: Connect, Organize, and Collaborate in Decentralized Communities
landing_hero_subtitle: Join topic-based communities, coordinate events, and engage in real-time discussions‚Äîall powered by the Nostr protocol
landing_features_communities_description: Discover and join communities aligned with your interests. Connect with like-minded individuals and share your passion.
landing_features_calendar_description: Coordinate events and never miss what matters. Create, share, and attend community events with ease.
landing_features_decentralized_descripti: Your data, your control. Powered by the Nostr protocol for censorship-resistant, decentralized communication.
landing_meta_description: Connect, organize, and collaborate in decentralized communities powered by Nostr protocol
landing_carousel_subtitle: Join vibrant communities and connect with people who share your interests
auth_signup_private_key_warning: Keep your private key safe. You'll need it to login.
auth_login_modal_choose_method: Choose how you want to login
auth_signup_modal_intro_p1: To join Nostr you need a profile, but it is not the usual one that a company generates and manages for you. You create it yourself, no permissions are required.
auth_signup_modal_intro_p2: Nostr is a different experience from the beginning: because there is no central authority taking care of who is who, each user is identified by a cryptographic keypair; don't worry about the tech slang, it is just a strong password that you will have to keep safe.
auth_signup_modal_intro_p3: This wizard is used by Jumble to let you create your new profile and safely manage it, in a few steps.
auth_signup_modal_profile_picture_hint: Paste an image URL for your avatar
auth_signup_modal_keys_title: Well done {name}, your Nostr profile is ready! Yes, it was that easy.
auth_signup_modal_keys_p1: On Nostr your keypair is identified by a unique string that starts with npub. This is your public profile code you can share with anyone.
auth_signup_modal_keys_p2: Then there is the private key. It starts with nsec, and is used to control your profile and to publish notes. This must be kept absolutely secret.
auth_signup_modal_keys_warning: Now please download your nsec (it's a text file) and save it in a safe place, for example your password manager.
auth_signup_modal_follow_description: Here are some suggested users to follow. You can skip this step if you prefer.

auth_login_private_key_error_invalid_for: Invalid key format. Please enter a valid nsec or ncryptsec key.
auth_login_private_key_error_login_faile: Failed to log in. Please check your key and try again.

settings_gated_mode_description: Control whether the app fetches content from fallback public relays or only from app-configured relays.
settings_gated_mode_forced: This setting is controlled by the app administrator
settings_gated_mode_enabled_description: Content is fetched only from app-configured relays. This provides a curated, controlled content experience.
settings_gated_mode_disabled_description: Content is fetched from both app-configured relays and public fallback relays, providing broader content discovery.
